name: SteelLIFE
description: Struggling against the deadly virus, humanity undertakes an insane yet the only possible attempt for rescue. A group of scientists had discovered how to transform humans into mechanical robots immune to the virus.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+ Processor: 1.0 GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9.0 (shader model 3.0) DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 370 MB available space
